urls.title: BUILDING WITH NATURE STANDARDS BOARD — Building with Nature
urls.description: 26 March 2019, updated 27 April 2020 Building with Nature is delighted to announce the appointment of the organisation’s Standards Board. Eleven additional members join the Chair, Professor Alister Scott, and will act as the guardian body for the Building with Nature standards.

text:
Really signficant @BuildWithNature meeting today on standards review. Thanks to @planitpres @RichardBlyth7 @EPlanna @juliathrift @elainecresswll Welsh Govt, Scottish Govt, @TaylorWimpeyplc @Pinsent_Masons Vertigo @EnvAgency @WildlifeTrusts @thepmadden 
    https://t.co/C4UuCXumrx

text:
The @EnvAgency head says that the climate emergency is hitting “worst case scenario” levels.

5.2 million homes and businesses in England are already at risk of flooding.

Government must urgently reduce emissions and up its game on climate adaptation here and internationally.

urls.title: Surveying the canals for otters and other mammals
urls.description: An online talk about surveying the canals for Otters.

text:
28 Feb 2pm: The @WildsideAC #Wolverhampton, have fascinating online talk with Derek Crawley from Staffordshire Mammal group:

Surveying the canals for otters and other #mammals

https://t.co/XMFi20SSIV
